name: Savvy Sloth: The Survival Of The Slavs
name_original: Savvy Sloth: The Survival Of The Slavs
description: Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world of Savvy Sloth! In this survival game, you play as a sloth who owns a catering van, tasked with gathering resources and completing challenges in the wasteland. However, beware of the dangers lurking around every corner, including radiation storms and wild, radiated animals. Keep yourself safe from the storms by avoiding them for a certain amount of time, and fend off the radiated animals using special snacks found during your scavenging endeavors. When you've collected all the necessary resources and completed all challenges, return to your base to secure your survival."
